alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 3:33AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Wind Today and Accumulating Snow Monday through Wednesday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...Strong southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 50 mph. Locally higher gusts to 65 mph on ridge tops. Accumulating snow of 3 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Eastern Sweetwater County, and southeast Fremont County. * WHEN...The strong winds will occur through this evening. The accumulating snow will occur late tonight, and last through midday Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Control issues for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. The snow will result in winter driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind will blow around loose objects. Motorists should prepare for sudden strong gusts if traveling these roads.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range
